name: FightSaar_Natasha
_source: speak;Saar;Finally, you show up cleric wench!
speak;Natasha;I am of Grado too!|Why are you doing this to me?!
speak;Saar;That doesn't matter to a dead woman.|Now be a good girl and face your end!
speak;Natasha;No!|I cannot die yet!|Grado needs my help!

speak;Natasha;H-heaven help me!|Save me from this evil!
